title: Ex-Master Support LF ADC DUO
body:
Decayed alot over the past few months, getting back into climbing back to Diamond atm.
Account is low plat, so looking for something between mid plat/low dia. Can a normal or two to see if we mesh first.

Contact in-game. Changed name recently from the name I used at higher elo. 

Prefer laning with hypercarries such as Kogmaw, Vayne, Jinx, Twitch etc etc.

Ward Bot.

replies.body: Can you please tell me if lux and teemo are a viable option in bronze? If so, please explain.
